name: Donald UNGER, Appellant v. PA. BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Unger v. PA. Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Donald UNGER, Appellant v. PA. BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of July, 2011, the Application for Summary Relief/Application for Stay is GRANTED to the extent that it requests summary relief. The Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED. The Application for Summary Relief/Application for Stay is DISMISSED AS MOOT to the extent that it requests a stay of the briefing schedule.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
22 A.3d 1032
Donald UNGER, Appellant v. PA. BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 15, 2011.
